RAR - [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/TzHaar-Xile.rar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/TzHaar-Xile.rar[/url] Client. JAR - [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/client.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/client.jar[/url] Snow Client - https://dl.dropbox.com/u/77631916/Tzhaar%20Snowclient.jar
Features:
-718 Loading 728 -Loadstones -Working g.E -Working SoF -Great Eco -Perfect donator zone with shops -Working KILN -Good, customized source -Fast server -Great uptime (VPS hosted 24/7) -Amazing economy -Great levelling rates -Fun users & staff -All bosses including: Nex, all Godwars, Tormented demons etc, Queen Black Dragon -HD -Webclient -Great forums -Prizes to be won -all chaotics -All skillcapes including Max and Completionist -Not ruined by modded items -everything working -great PvP areas -Staking works -Custom dies (Dice) -Incredible staff system And many more features!
